biotools.summary: Asymmetric Winsorization per Sample Transformation (AWST) is data normalisation method for RNA-seq data. It is robust to data perturbations and removes the need for selecting the most informative genes prior to sample clustering.

bioschemas.name: AWST
bioschemas.summary: Asymmetric Winsorization per Sample Transformation (AWST) is data normalisation method for RNA-seq data. It is robust to data perturbations and removes the need for selecting the most informative genes prior to sample clustering.
